descriptionHtml:
[size=15pt][b]Description[/b][/size]
This is a my first attempt to make a follower mod, so please understand there could be some flaws.
This is Rory Campbell, a tall, big breasted female barbarian.
The body type I used is created by me: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48647/?]Large Nipples Body TBBP - A CBPlusPlus Bodyslide Preset or replacer[/url]
She can be found in Candle Hearth Hall, Windhelm
She also comes with a LNB Orcish armor, LNB Ebony Mail (Not enchanted) and a steel great sword.


[color=red][size=15pt][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]
A TBBP compatible skeleton.


[color=orange][size=15][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
NMM user:
1)Just activate the mod

Manual installation:
1)Extract contents in archive according to paths


[size=15pt][b]Credits[/b][/size]
